mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_task (title, start, `end`, color, userid, custid, salesid, remindertime) VALUES (#{title},#{start},#{end},#{color},#{userid},#{custid},#{salesid},#{remindertime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task SET color = #{color},done=#{done} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_task WHERE userid = #{userid} and date(start) >=#{start} and date(`end`) <= #{end}
